config.sql: SELECT id, text, leaf, isdrill, bnlj, sntq, zje, zjlv, indis, cyz, CASE WHEN( dimpeirod <> 3 AND dimpeirod <> 6 AND dimpeirod <> 9 AND dimpeirod <> 12) AND m.groups = 0 AND ( zje >= ( 0 ) OR zje <= ( 0 ) ) THEN 1 WHEN ( dimpeirod = 3 OR dimpeirod = 6 OR dimpeirod = 9 OR dimpeirod = 12 ) AND ( zje >= ( m.zze ) OR zje <= ( m.jse ) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isjump FROM ( SELECT id, text, leaf, isdrill, bnlj, sntq, bnlj - sntq AS zje, round(DECODE(nvl(sntq, 0), 0, 0,(nvl(bnlj, 0) - nvl(sntq, 0)) * 100 / abs(nvl(sntq, 0))), 2) AS zjlv, round(c / 1, 2) AS indis, round(bnlj - c / 1, 2) AS cyz FROM ( SELECT n.scode AS id, n.sname AS text, n.spcode AS isdrill, round(DECODE(nvl(cbn, 0), 0, 0,(nvl(bbn, 0)) * 100 * 2 / nvl(cbn, 0)), 2) AS bnlj, round(DECODE(nvl(csn, 0), 0, 0,(nvl(bsn, 0)) * 100 * 2 / nvl(csn, 0)), 2) AS sntq, ids.a, ids.b, ids.c, ids.d, ids.e, n.cisleaf AS leaf FROM ( SELECT bbn, cbn, bsn, csn, n.scode, n.cisleaf, n.sname, ( CASE WHEN n.sindcode IS NULL THEN 'Z' ELSE n.sindcode END ) AS sindcode, n.srangecode, n.spcode FROM ( SELECT SUM(bbn) AS bbn, SUM(cbn) AS cbn, SUM(bsn) AS bsn, SUM(csn) AS csn, dim_company FROM ( SELECT SUM(bbn) AS bbn, SUM(bsn) AS bsn, 0 AS cbn, 0 AS csn, dim_company FROM ( SELECT nvl(fact_b, 0) AS bbn, 0 AS bsn, dim_company FROM dw_factfinanceperiod WHERE dim_itemperiod IN ( '1400111' ) AND dim_period = '201712' AND dim_company IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS bbn, nvl(fact_b, 0) AS bsn, dim_company FROM dw_factfinanceperiod WHERE dim_itemperiod IN ( '1400111' ) AND dim_period = '201612' AND dim_company IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) ) bn GROUP BY dim_company UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS bbn, 0 AS bsn, SUM(cbn) AS cbn, SUM(csn) AS csn, dim_company FROM ( SELECT nvl(fact_a, 0) + nvl(fact_b, 0) AS cbn, 0 AS csn, dim_company FROM dw_factfinancepoint WHERE dim_itempoint IN (1311009) AND dim_period = :period AND dim_company IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS cbn, nvl(fact_a, 0) + nvl(fact_b, 0) AS csn, dim_company FROM dw_factfinancepoint WHERE dim_itempoint IN (1311009) AND dim_period = :comparePeriod AND dim_company IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) ) sn GROUP BY dim_company ) nwt GROUP BY dim_company ) m RIGHT JOIN dw_dimcompany n ON m.dim_company = n.scode WHERE n.scode IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) ) n LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM dw_factindustry WHERE indsyear = ( SELECT MAX(scode) FROM dw_dimindsyear WHERE scode <= substr( :period, 1, 4) ) ) ids ON ids.indsclassify = n.sindcode AND ids.indsrange = n.srangecode AND indspara = '02' ) ) w LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mp.scomcode, mp.monitor_zze AS zze, mp.monitor_jse AS jse, mp.monitor_zzl AS zzl, mp.monitor_jsl AS jsl, mi.sgroup AS groups, 12 AS dimpeirod, mp.speriod FROM rpt_monitor_parameter mp INNER JOIN rpt_monitor_index mi ON mp.nmonitor_id = mi.nmonitor_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT scomcode, MAX(speriod) AS speriod FROM rpt_monitor_parameter WHERE speriod <= :period AND spamtype = ( CASE WHEN mod(substr( :period, 5, 2), 3) = 0 THEN '3' ELSE '4' END ) GROUP BY scomcode ) tt ON ( tt.scomcode = mp.scomcode ) WHERE mi.stype = 'inds' AND mi.sfieldcode = '19' AND mp.speriod = tt.speriod AND spamtype = ( CASE WHEN mod(substr( :period, 5, 2), 3) = 0 THEN '3' ELSE '4' END ) ) m ON m.scomcode = w.id order by id
config.apisql: SELECT c.nid AS id, c.scontent AS cause, c.suser AS createUser, c.screatetime AS createTime, c.platform AS platform, c.stitle AS title, c.nsource AS source, s.scontent AS text,(SELECT struename FROM sys_user WHERE suser = c.suser) AS trueName, (SELECT nlocked FROM rpt_company_report cr WHERE scompany = '1010' AND speriod = '201606' AND nreport > 1) AS locked FROM sys_source_comment c INNER JOIN sys_topic_source s ON s.nid = c.nsource WHERE s.smoduleid IN ('report') AND s.scontent LIKE '%/_1010_201606_1-1416001%' ESCAPE '/' ORDER BY s.createtime DESC
